SENT.plain: In approximately 10% of all cases of endobrachesophagus a malignant degeneration occurs
A frequent endoscopic and bioptic control of the endobrachesophagus is the prognostic decision in order for a developing adenocarcinom to be identified in the early stages
Our casuistry demonstrates the problematic nature of the diagnostic and therapy of a multifocal adenocarcinom in an endobrachesophagus
